comments:
Got this exception when shutting down the workbench.  
I invoked the "Switch Workspace" action when this exception happened.

Steps to reproduce:
*  Java perspective has view management turned on.
*  launch java program
*  terminate the debug session

Debug View, Breakpoints View and Variables View are closed.

*  Shut down the workbench and you would get the exception.
Marking as RC3 candidate. Will ask for approval once we have the patch.
The 'partClosed' notification from the page book is sent when any part is closed, not just the variables view... However something else is amuck here.

Created an attachment (id=40249)
patch

saveState is called 4 times when the workbench is shut down. Quick fix is to check if the sash for is disposed.

CC DW for RC3 approval

-Note: to reproduce this I had to kill the workbench w/o terminating the debug session.

Created an attachment (id=40280)
patch

This is a better patch.
Changed to persist state when the viewer is deactivated. On shutdown the sash form is disposed before we recieve partClosed. Also changed the name of saveState() method to save viewer state because we no longer restore sash weights from the workbench's memento, so persisting them there as well as in our own doesn't make sense.
Like the patch. CC'ing Markus for approval.
